title: Terms of service
subtitle:
Thank you for choosing to create an account with ULF!.

By signing up and using our services, you agree to the following Terms of Service:

details.title: Account Creation:
details.description: By creating an account, you certify that you are at least 18 years old or have reached the age of majority in your jurisdiction.

details.title: Personal Information:
details.description: You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the signup process, including your username, email address, and password.

details.title: Account Security:
details.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for any activity that occurs under your account.

details.title: Acceptable Use:
details.description: You agree to use the ULF platform and services in accordance with applicable laws and regulations and to refrain from engaging in any illegal, harmful, or abusive activities.

details.title: Privacy:
details.description: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information

details.title: Modification of Terms:
details.description: ULF reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our platform. It is your responsibility to review these terms periodically for updates.

details.title: Termination:
details.description: ULF reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these Terms of Service or for any other reason deemed necessary by ULF.
